content: Skyscraper in SingaporeThis article **needs additional citations for verification**. Please help improve this article by adding citations to reliable sources. Unsourced material may be challenged and removed. *Find sources:* "The Plaza" Singapore – news **·** newspapers **·** books **·** scholar **·** JSTOR *(April 2021)* *(Learn how and when to remove this message)* **The Plaza** is a [high-rise](/wiki/High-rise) [commercial](/wiki/Commercial_property) and [residential](/wiki/Residential) building on [Beach Road](/wiki/Beach_Road,_Singapore) in [Kallang](/wiki/Kallang), Singapore. The complex consists of a 30-storey residential and commercial tower and an 8-storey building housing The Plaza [Parkroyal](/wiki/Parkroyal) hotel. One of the Poshest residential in the center of the central, Arab street, Bugis and marina skyline facing . The tower has a distinctive [triangular prism](/wiki/Triangular_prism) design, with each face being concave. Embassy of [Zimbabwe](/wiki/Zimbabwe) is located on the 13th floor of The Plaza whereas the Honorary Consulate of [Belarus](/wiki/Belarus) can be found on the 16th floor of the building. ## History The Plaza complex was completed in 1979. 1°17′57″N 103°51′30″E﻿ / ﻿1.2992°N 103.8582°E﻿ / 1.2992; 103.8582 This article about a Singapore building or structure is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it. - v - t - e
title: The Plaza (Singapore)
